description: 5-minute video comparing Pythagoras' Theorem understanding in ancient Mesopotamia and another chosen culture (Egypt, India, China, or Greece), with PowerPoint slides. Assessed on delivery, research accuracy, and presentation cohesion.
Exercises covering weeks 1-2 content, focusing on problem-solving and computations using ancient methods. Provides initial feedback on Arithmetic and Algorithms sections.
1-hour mid-session test during week 5 assessing weeks 1-4 content. Emphasizes problem-solving and computations, particularly in Basic Geometry.
2-hour paper-based exam covering all course content, including historical approaches to arithmetic, algorithms, and geometry. Features MCQ, short numerical, and short answer questions.
